```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(bit64)
```

```{r}
raw_hhs_indo <- read_csv(here("raw_data", "hhs", "hhs_indonesia_raw.csv"))
raw_hhs_bra <- read_csv(here("raw_data", "hhs", "hhs_brazil_raw.csv"))
```

```{r}
hhs_indo <- read_csv(here("hhs_global.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() %>%
  filter(country == "IDN")

hhs_indo_eng <- hhs_indo %>%
  select(country, level1_name, level2_name,  level3_name, )
  
hhs_indo_agr <- hhs_indo
  
```
